Module: jmodel/ajax/ajax

Ajax Module - module for performing network requests
Source:
  • jmodel/ajax/ajax.js, line 19

Methods

(inner) call(_type, _route, _reqData, _callback)

Function to make a basic ajax call
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_type string type of request
_route string path of the route to be called
_reqData Object data to be included either as a route parameter or route query
_callback function function to execute after request is complete
Source:
  • jmodel/ajax/ajax.js, line 21

(inner) insertDataInRoutes(_data, _modelName, _method) → {Object}

Function to make an abstracted ajax call unique to restful web interfaces
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_data Object data to be included either as a route parameter or route query
_modelName string name of the model for which the data is being sent
_method string type of restful request
Source:
  • jmodel/ajax/ajax.js, line 89
Returns:
_data separated by its method of sending (parameter or query)

Object
